headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https:; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://maps.google.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
